languages.text: "Я горжусь тем, что династия фон Валанциус не оставляет старые обиды без ответа. Пусть каждый ксенос знает — преступление против Вольного Торговца обернется для него гибелью!"
"I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"
languages.original_text: "Я горжусь тем, что династия фон Валанциус не оставляет старые обиды без ответа. Пусть каждый ксенос знает — преступление против Вольного Торговца обернется для него гибелью!"

traits.locale_text: "I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"

languages.text: “我很骄傲，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝没有轻易遗忘宿怨。现在每个异形都会知道，冒犯行商浪人将会给他们带来厄运！”
languages.original_text: "I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"

traits.locale_text: “我很骄傲，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝没有轻易遗忘宿怨。现在每个异形都会知道，冒犯行商浪人将会给他们带来厄运！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis fier de voir que la dynastie von Valancius ne laisse aucun crime impuni. Que tous les xénos sachent que quiconque offensera {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en paiera le prix ! »
languages.original_text: "I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis fier de voir que la dynastie von Valancius ne laisse aucun crime impuni. Que tous les xénos sachent que quiconque offensera {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en paiera le prix ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Me enorgullece ver que la dinastía von Valancius no deja pasar los viejos agravios. ¡Que todo xenos sepa que un crimen contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente traerá su condena!».
languages.original_text: "I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"

traits.locale_text: «Me enorgullece ver que la dinastía von Valancius no deja pasar los viejos agravios. ¡Que todo xenos sepa que un crimen contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente traerá su condena!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が過去の怨恨を放置しないことを誇りに思います。すべての異種族には自由開拓者に逆らう罪が何をもたらすのか、知らしめてやりましょう！」
languages.original_text: "I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が過去の怨恨を放置しないことを誇りに思います。すべての異種族には自由開拓者に逆らう罪が何をもたらすのか、知らしめてやりましょう！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin stolz, dass die Dynastie von Valancius einen alten Groll nicht unbeantwortet lässt. Alle Xenos sollen wissen, dass ein Verbrechen gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihnen den Untergang bringen wird!"
languages.original_text: "I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin stolz, dass die Dynastie von Valancius einen alten Groll nicht unbeantwortet lässt. Alle Xenos sollen wissen, dass ein Verbrechen gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihnen den Untergang bringen wird!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"

languages.text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığının eski garazları cevapsız bırakmaması beni gururlandırıyor. Her bir zeno duysun ve bilsin ki Hür Tacir'e karşı işlenen suçlar, felaketleri olacaktır!"
languages.original_text: "I am proud that the von Valancius dynasty does not let old grudges go unanswered. Let every xenos know that a crime against the Rogue Trader will bring doom upon them!"

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığının eski garazları cevapsız bırakmaması beni gururlandırıyor. Her bir zeno duysun ve bilsin ki Hür Tacir'e karşı işlenen suçlar felaketleri olacaktır!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
